Howard Stern calls for Hollywood to boycott Jay Leno ( video) Howard Stern ended his third and final segment on Thursday night's Late Show once again pushing for David Letterman to holler back at him off camera: `` Maybe we'll get our relationship on track. I want to say this. I offered my apology and it's sincere. If you trust that I'm somewhat normal now, what we'll do is we'll start by calling each other and then maybe I'll come out to Montana and I'll stare at the wall with you and we'll see what happens. " Hmm,... what would the Iron Sheik have to say about this?
